T-SQL.title: BREAK
T-SQL.content: THROW 50000, 'This script should not be run as a whole. It contains manual operations (step-by-step).';

Quotes.title: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

Quotes.title: Isaac Newton
Quotes.content: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
